trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Grande Prairie
There were no other sightings in Grande Prairie on or around October 15th 1975
divs: sighting detailsi was driving, saw this about 1\4 mile to my left, about 1500' up. did not dare slow down or stop, it was dark, late and my gas gauge was about on empty. a day or so later i read in the local newspaper (and i think i still have the clipping) that rcmp (police officers) had seen virtually the same thing about the same time, about 150 miles north of here. i just happened to glance to my left when it caught my eye. i did not see it move. i wonder what it was, even now. i lost sight of it as i continued driving home. i was about 5 miles out of the city, returning from a 500 mile trip.
